Scene:
The Temmaya Tea House
(Tenmaya / 天満屋)

Play: The Love Suicides at Sonezaki (曽根崎心中)

Production: September 1971 Kōkōsei no tame no Bunraku Kyōshitsu



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Sakitayū (豊竹咲大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Takezawa Yashichi X (竹澤弥七 (十))
